scripts.jekyll-stop: ps aux | grep 'jekyll serve' | awk '{print $2}' | xargs kill -9
scripts.test-firefox: npm run jekyll-background; cypress run --headless --browser firefox --env host=http://localhost:4000
scripts.test-chrome: npm run jekyll-background; cypress run --headless --browser chrome --env host=http://localhost:4000
scripts.test: npm run test-firefox && npm run test-chrome
scripts.test-docker: npm run test-firefox-docker && npm run test-chrome-docker
scripts.test-prod: npm run test-firefox-prod && npm run test-chrome-prod
scripts.cypress: npm run jekyll-background; cypress open --env host=http://localhost:4000
